lead_paragraph: Visiting Washington this week, Daw Aung San Suu Kyi will reunite with the Senate majority leader, who has supported her attempts to promote democracy at home for years.

headline.print_headline: Myanmar Leader Finds Longtime Champion in McConnell
headline.main: Myanmar’s Leader Has a Longtime Champion in Mitch McConnell

snippet: Visiting Washington this week, Daw Aung San Suu Kyi will reunite with the Senate majority leader, who has supported her attempts to promote democracy at home for years....
